Author: jellyboness
Text: I can’t go to the doctor because I’m paranoid my home scale is somehow wrong or defective and if I get weighed at the doctor I magically won’t be underweight anymore. And I feel like if I’m not underweight nobody will take me seriously.

Author: beaglesarebest
Text: I also get weighed every week at the doctor's and find it super triggering. Logically I know he'd be happy if I gained weight, but I think somehow I'm afraid of not being taken seriously if that happens?  I'm so sorry you're struggling. Just know you're not alone, I feel totally stuck as well. Could it be an option to talk to your doctor about how you find the weigh-ins triggering?
